text: Jasmine Daly. Author, maintainer.

title: Authors and Citation
text: Daly J (2025). ttbbeer: US Beer Statistics TTB. R package version 1.1.0, https://github.com/jasdumas/ttbbeer.
code: @Manual{,   title = {ttbbeer: US Beer Statistics from TTB},   author = {Jasmine Daly},   year = {2025},   note = {R package version 1.1.0},   url = {https://github.com/jasdumas/ttbbeer}, }

what: An R data package of beer statistics from U.S. Department of the Treasury, Alcohol and Tobacco Tax and Trade Bureau (TTB)
title: US Beer Statistics from TTB
text: package provides one data set materials used U.S. breweries listed Beer Monthly Statistical Releases, eight data sets historical tax rates distilled spirits, wine, beer, champagne, tobacco. motivation behind package provide analysis-ready data sets original data beermaterials PDF format can difficult read R, given small ecosystem PDF parsing R packages : tm, tabulizer. goals package provide data sets R ecosystem beer analytics open government data portals.

title: US Beer Statistics from TTB
text: install package type following: can install development version Github:

title: US Beer Statistics from TTB
text: components package data set called beermaterials includes materials used U.S. breweries beer production reported monthly basis U.S. Department Treasury, Alcohol Tobacco Tax Trade Bureau (TTB) 2006 2015. components package include eight data sets depicting historical tax rate distilled spirits, wine, beer, champagne, tobacco. Several different types data analysis projects can conducted using data : Exploratory Data Analysis, Time Series Analysis. intended audience data everyone especially interested open government data beer analytics. project released Contributor Code Conduct. participating project agree abide terms.
code: data("beermaterials") data("artificialcarbontax") data("champagnetax") data("spirittax") data("winetax14") data("winetax1421") data("winetax2124") data("beertax") data("tobaccotax")

title: US Beer Statistics from TTB
text: Package Author: Jasmine Daly dalyanalytics.com

title: The artificialcarbontax dataset — artificialcarbontax
text: dataset contains list historical tax rates  artificial carbon per wine gallon TTB.

title: The artificialcarbontax dataset — artificialcarbontax
text: data frame 10 observations 3 variables: , date starting tax rate , date ending tax rate. last row considered present day rate indicated package creation date. RATE RATE, dollars

title: The artificialcarbontax dataset — artificialcarbontax
text: http://catalog.data.gov/dataset/historical-tax-rates

title: The beermaterials dataset — beermaterials
text: monthly aggregation materials used US Breweries reported TTB.     dataset transcribed PDF's .rda dataset.

title: The beermaterials dataset — beermaterials
text: data frame 120 observations 11 variables: Month Month year Year Calendar Year Malt_and_malt_products Malt malt products, pounds Corn_and _corn_products Corn corn products, pounds Rice_and_rice_products Rice rice products, pounds Barley_and_barley_products Barley barley products, pounds Wheat_and_wheat_products Wheat wheat products Sugar_and_syrups Sugar syrups, pounds Hops_dry Hops dry form, pounds Hops_extracts Hops extracted form, pounds materials flavor, pounds

title: The beermaterials dataset — beermaterials
text: https://catalog.data.gov/dataset/beer-production--operations-reports

title: The beertax dataset — beertax
text: dataset contains list historical tax rates  beer per 31 gallon Bbl. TTB.

title: The beertax dataset — beertax
text: data frame 10 observations 3 variables: , date starting tax rate. first date listed day, 09/01/1862 used. , date ending tax rate. last row considered present day rate indicated package creation date. RATE RATE, dollars. last two entries originally '$9/$7' '$18/$' respectively.

title: The beertax dataset — beertax
text: http://catalog.data.gov/dataset/historical-tax-rates

title: The champagnetax dataset — champagnetax
text: dataset contains list historical tax rates  champagne sparkling wine per wine gallon TTB.

title: The champagnetax dataset — champagnetax
text: data frame 10 observations 3 variables: , date starting tax rate , date ending tax rate. last row considered present day rate indicated package creation date. RATE RATE, dollars

title: The champagnetax dataset — champagnetax
text: http://catalog.data.gov/dataset/historical-tax-rates

title: The spirittax dataset — spirittax
text: dataset contains list historical tax rates distilled spirits per proof gallon TTB.

title: The spirittax dataset — spirittax
text: data frame 15 observations 3 variables: , date starting tax rate , date ending tax rate. last row considered present day rate indicated package creation date. RATE RATE, dollars

title: The spirittax dataset — spirittax
text: http://catalog.data.gov/dataset/historical-tax-rates

title: The tobaccotax dataset — tobaccotax
text: dataset contains list historical tax rates  tobacco tobacco products TTB.

title: The tobaccotax dataset — tobaccotax
text: data frame 46 observations 3 variables: ITEM ITEM, specific tobacco-based product. , date starting tax rate. first date listed day, 09/01/1862 used. , date ending tax rate. last row considered present day rate indicated package creation date. RATE RATE, dollars. Small cigarettes Large cigars per thousand. Chewing tobacco Roll per pound. Cigarette papers tubes per 50.

title: The tobaccotax dataset — tobaccotax
text: http://catalog.data.gov/dataset/historical-tax-rates

what: ttbbeer: A package for US Brewery data sets. — ttbbeer
title: ttbbeer: A package for US Brewery data sets. — ttbbeer
text: ttbbeer package includes current state, one data set    collection 10 years (2006 - 2015) worth data materials    used U.S. breweries pounds reported Brewer's Report    Operations Quarterly Brewer's Report Operations    forms, ready data analysis.

title: ttbbeer: A package for US Brewery data sets. — ttbbeer
text: ttbbeer functions include data("beermaterials").

title: ttbbeer 1.1.0
